name: Autumn Leaves (liadovdat5)
description:
Autumn Leaves

Autumn is here and the leaves started falling on the yard, the old lady is lucky to run into the Leaves Boy! 
Do your duty and make sure the is not even one leaf on ground.

This game was made of the " Great Autumn Game Jam: 2021 " 

Credits:

Creator - Liad Ovdat https://liadovdat5.itch.io/

Forest Background - edermunizz https://edermunizz.itch.io/free-pixel-art-forest

Character - rvros https://rvros.itch.io/animated-pixel-hero

Old Lady - http://seas.ucla.edu/~melissa/gs.html

Coin - https://www.freepik.com/free-vector/golden-coin-different-positions-shiny-piece-...

Leaves - https://www.freepik.com/free-vector/watercolor-autumn-leaves-collection_17542146...

Clock - https://www.freepik.com/free-vector/flat-time-logo-templates-collection_13763666...

Background Sound - Yubatake https://opengameart.org/content/runaround

Sound Effect - using SFXR https://www.drpetter.se/project_sfxr.html

Fonts: 
https://www.1001fonts.com/lovelly-autumn-font.html
https://www.1001fonts.com/grandmas-garden-font.html
